alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 4:16AM MST until December 28 at 4:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PST / 10 AM MST THIS MORNING TO 3 AM PST / 4 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Gusts to 60 mph possible in the higher terrain. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST / 10 AM MST this morning to 3 AM PST / 4 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau
